name: Paranormal Investigation
description:
‘Paranormal Investigation’ was created 4 Level 3 Second Year college students (aged 18-21), with 2 3D artists, a 2D artist and a gameplay programmer. Our team was tasked with creating a virtual escape room game with the client, Make Your Escape Derby.

Credits-

3D Model Artist – Xena B (@red_night_eternity on Instagram) (me)

Programmer/Game Scripting – Artur GB (AsCii_exe on GitHub)

2D Graphics and User Interface Artist – Jess ‘Moss’ G (@cosmos_dragonfly on Instagram)

3D Environment Setup – Josh L

thank you to everyone who helped out!!!
